alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mainland Monroe and central Miami-Dade Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fortymile Bend, or 22 miles northwest of Homestead General Airport, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shark Valley Obs Tower, Loop Road Ee Center, Fortymile Bend and Everglades National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
